02972 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02973 void CDXUTComboBox::OnFocusOut()
02974 {
02975     CDXUTButton::OnFocusOut();
02976 
02977     m_bOpened = false;
02978 }
02979 
02980 
02981 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
02982 bool CDXUTComboBox::HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
02983 {
02984     const DWORD REPEAT_MASK = (0x40000000);
02985 
02986     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
02987         return false;
02988 
02989     // Let the scroll bar have a chance to handle it first
02990     if( m_ScrollBar.HandleKeyboard( uMsg, wParam, lParam ) )
02991         return true;
02992 
02993     switch( uMsg )
02994     {
02995         case WM_KEYDOWN:
02996         {
02997             switch( wParam )
02998             {
02999                 case VK_RETURN:
03000                     if( m_bOpened )
03001                     {
03002                         if( m_iSelected != m_iFocused )
03003                         {
03004                             m_iSelected = m_iFocused;
03005                             m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03006                         }
03007                         m_bOpened = false;
03008                         
03009                         if( !m_pDialog->m_bKeyboardInput )
03010                             m_pDialog->ClearFocus();
03011 
03012                         return true;
03013                     }
03014                     break;
03015 
03016                 case VK_F4:
03017                     // Filter out auto-repeats
03018                     if( lParam & REPEAT_MASK )
03019                         return true;
03020 
03021                     m_bOpened = !m_bOpened;
03022 
03023                     if( !m_bOpened )
03024                     {
03025                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03026 
03027                         if( !m_pDialog->m_bKeyboardInput )
03028                             m_pDialog->ClearFocus();
03029                     }
03030 
03031                     return true;
03032 
03033                 case VK_LEFT:
03034                 case VK_UP:
03035                     if( m_iFocused > 0 )
03036                     {
03037                         m_iFocused--;
03038                         m_iSelected = m_iFocused;
03039 
03040                         if( !m_bOpened )
03041                             m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03042                     }
03043                     
03044                     return true;
03045 
03046                 case VK_RIGHT:
03047                 case VK_DOWN:
03048                     if( m_iFocused+1 < (int)GetNumItems() )
03049                     {
03050                         m_iFocused++;
03051                         m_iSelected = m_iFocused;
03052 
03053                         if( !m_bOpened )
03054                             m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03055                     }
03056 
03057                     return true;
03058             }
03059             break;
03060         }
03061     }
03062 
03063     return false;
03064 }
03065 
03066 
03067 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03068 bool CDXUTComboBox::HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
03069 {
03070     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
03071         return false;
03072 
03073     // Let the scroll bar handle it first.
03074     if( m_ScrollBar.HandleMouse( uMsg, pt, wParam, lParam ) )
03075         return true;
03076 
03077     switch( uMsg )
03078     {
03079         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
03080         {
03081             if( m_bOpened && PtInRect( &m_rcDropdown, pt ) )
03082             {
03083                 // Determine which item has been selected
03084                 for( int i=0; i < m_Items.GetSize(); i++ )
03085                 {
03086                     DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
03087                     if( pItem -> bVisible &&
03088                         PtInRect( &pItem->rcActive, pt ) )
03089                     {
03090                         m_iFocused = i;
03091                     }
03092                 }
03093                 return true;
03094             }
03095             break;
03096         }
03097 
03098         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
03099         case WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK:
03100         {
03101             if( ContainsPoint( pt ) )
03102             {
03103                 // Pressed while inside the control
03104                 m_bPressed = true;
03105                 SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
03106 
03107                 if( !m_bHasFocus )
03108                     m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this );
03109 
03110                 // Toggle dropdown
03111                 if( m_bHasFocus )
03112                 {
03113                     m_bOpened = !m_bOpened;
03114                 
03115                     if( !m_bOpened )
03116                     {
03117                         if( !m_pDialog->m_bKeyboardInput )
03118                             m_pDialog->ClearFocus();
03119                     }
03120                 }
03121 
03122                 return true;
03123             }
03124 
03125             // Perhaps this click is within the dropdown
03126             if( m_bOpened && PtInRect( &m_rcDropdown, pt ) )
03127             {
03128                 // Determine which item has been selected
03129                 for( int i=m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos(); i < m_Items.GetSize(); i++ )
03130                 {
03131                     DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
03132                     if( pItem -> bVisible &&
03133                         PtInRect( &pItem->rcActive, pt ) )
03134                     {
03135                         m_iFocused = m_iSelected = i;
03136                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03137                         m_bOpened = false;
03138                         
03139                         if( !m_pDialog->m_bKeyboardInput )
03140                             m_pDialog->ClearFocus();
03141 
03142                         break;
03143                     }
03144                 }
03145 
03146                 return true;
03147             }
03148 
03149             // Mouse click not on main control or in dropdown, fire an event if needed
03150             if( m_bOpened )
03151             {
03152                 m_iFocused = m_iSelected;
03153 
03154                 m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03155                 m_bOpened = false;
03156             }
03157 
03158             // Make sure the control is no longer in a pressed state
03159             m_bPressed = false;
03160 
03161             // Release focus if appropriate
03162             if( !m_pDialog->m_bKeyboardInput )
03163             {
03164                 m_pDialog->ClearFocus();
03165             }
03166 
03167             break;
03168         }
03169 
03170         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
03171         {
03172             if( m_bPressed && ContainsPoint( pt ) )
03173             {
03174                 // Button click
03175                 m_bPressed = false;
03176                 ReleaseCapture();
03177                 return true;
03178             }
03179 
03180             break;
03181         }
03182 
03183         case WM_MOUSEWHEEL:
03184         {
03185             int zDelta = (short) HIWORD(wParam) / WHEEL_DELTA;
03186             if( m_bOpened )
03187             {
03188                 UINT uLines;
03189                 SystemParametersInfo( SPI_GETWHEELSCROLLLINES, 0, &uLines, 0 );
03190                 m_ScrollBar.Scroll( -zDelta * uLines );
03191             } else
03192             {
03193                 if( zDelta > 0 )
03194                 {
03195                     if( m_iFocused > 0 )
03196                     {
03197                         m_iFocused--;
03198                         m_iSelected = m_iFocused;     
03199                         
03200                         if( !m_bOpened )
03201                             m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03202                     }          
03203                 }
03204                 else
03205                 {
03206                     if( m_iFocused+1 < (int)GetNumItems() )
03207                     {
03208                         m_iFocused++;
03209                         m_iSelected = m_iFocused;   
03210 
03211                         if( !m_bOpened )
03212                             m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03213                     }
03214                 }
03215             }
03216             return true;
03217         }
03218     };
03219     
03220     return false;
03221 }
03222 
03223 
03224 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03225 void CDXUTComboBox::OnHotkey()
03226 {
03227     if( m_bOpened )
03228         return;
03229 
03230     if( m_iSelected == -1 )
03231         return;
03232 
03233     m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this ); 
03234 
03235     m_iSelected++;
03236     
03237     if( m_iSelected >= (int) m_Items.GetSize() )
03238         m_iSelected = 0;
03239 
03240     m_iFocused = m_iSelected;
03241     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, true, this );
03242 }
03243 
03244 
03245 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03246 void CDXUTComboBox::Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime )
03247 {
03248     DXUT_CONTROL_STATE iState = DXUT_STATE_NORMAL;
03249     
03250     if( !m_bOpened )
03251         iState = DXUT_STATE_HIDDEN;
03252 
03253     // Dropdown box
03254     CDXUTElement* pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 2 );
03255 
03256     // If we have not initialized the scroll bar page size,
03257     // do that now.
03258     static bool bSBInit;
03259     if( !bSBInit )
03260     {
03261         // Update the page size of the scroll bar
03262         if( m_pDialog->GetManager()->GetFontNode( pElement->iFont )->nHeight )
03263             m_ScrollBar.SetPageSize( RectHeight( m_rcDropdownText ) / m_pDialog->GetManager()->GetFontNode( pElement->iFont )->nHeight );
03264         else
03265             m_ScrollBar.SetPageSize( RectHeight( m_rcDropdownText ) );
03266         bSBInit = true;
03267     }
03268 
03269     // Scroll bar
03270     if( m_bOpened )
03271         m_ScrollBar.Render( pd3dDevice, fElapsedTime );
03272 
03273     // Blend current color
03274     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime );
03275     pElement->FontColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime );
03276 
03277     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcDropdown );
03278 
03279     // Selection outline
03280     CDXUTElement* pSelectionElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 3 );
03281     pSelectionElement->TextureColor.Current = pElement->TextureColor.Current;
03282     pSelectionElement->FontColor.Current = pSelectionElement->FontColor.States[ DXUT_STATE_NORMAL ];
03283 
03284     DXUTFontNode* pFont = m_pDialog->GetFont( pElement->iFont );
03285     if( pFont )
03286     {
03287         int curY = m_rcDropdownText.top;
03288         int nRemainingHeight = RectHeight( m_rcDropdownText );
03289         //WCHAR strDropdown[4096] = {0};
03290 
03291         for( int i = m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos(); i < m_Items.GetSize(); i++ )
03292         {
03293             DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
03294 
03295             // Make sure there's room left in the dropdown
03296             nRemainingHeight -= pFont->nHeight;
03297             if( nRemainingHeight < 0 )
03298             {
03299                 pItem->bVisible = false;
03300                 continue;
03301             }
03302 
03303             SetRect( &pItem->rcActive, m_rcDropdownText.left, curY, m_rcDropdownText.right, curY + pFont->nHeight );
03304             curY += pFont->nHeight;
03305             
03306             //debug
03307             //int blue = 50 * i;
03308             //m_pDialog->DrawRect( &pItem->rcActive, 0xFFFF0000 | blue );
03309 
03310             pItem->bVisible = true;
03311 
03312             if( m_bOpened )
03313             {
03314                 if( (int)i == m_iFocused )
03315                 {
03316                     RECT rc;
03317                     SetRect( &rc, m_rcDropdown.left, pItem->rcActive.top-2, m_rcDropdown.right, pItem->rcActive.bottom+2 );
03318                     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pSelectionElement, &rc );
03319                     m_pDialog->DrawText( pItem->strText, pSelectionElement, &pItem->rcActive );
03320                 }
03321                 else
03322                 {
03323                     m_pDialog->DrawText( pItem->strText, pElement, &pItem->rcActive );
03324                 }
03325             }
03326         }
03327     }
03328 
03329     int nOffsetX = 0;
03330     int nOffsetY = 0;
03331 
03332     iState = DXUT_STATE_NORMAL;
03333     
03334     if( m_bVisible == false )
03335         iState = DXUT_STATE_HIDDEN;
03336     else if( m_bEnabled == false )
03337         iState = DXUT_STATE_DISABLED;
03338     else if( m_bPressed )
03339     {
03340         iState = DXUT_STATE_PRESSED;
03341 
03342         nOffsetX = 1;
03343         nOffsetY = 2;
03344     }
03345     else if( m_bMouseOver )
03346     {
03347         iState = DXUT_STATE_MOUSEOVER;
03348 
03349         nOffsetX = -1;
03350         nOffsetY = -2;
03351     }
03352     else if( m_bHasFocus )
03353         iState = DXUT_STATE_FOCUS;
03354 
03355     float fBlendRate = ( iState == DXUT_STATE_PRESSED ) ? 0.0f : 0.8f;
03356     
03357     // Button
03358     pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 1 );
03359     
03360     // Blend current color
03361     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
03362     
03363     RECT rcWindow = m_rcButton;
03364     OffsetRect( &rcWindow, nOffsetX, nOffsetY );
03365     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &rcWindow );
03366 
03367     if( m_bOpened )
03368         iState = DXUT_STATE_PRESSED;
03369 
03370     // Main text box
03371     //TODO: remove magic numbers
03372     pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 0 );
03373     
03374     // Blend current color
03375     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
03376     pElement->FontColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
03377 
03378     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcText);
03379     
03380     if( m_iSelected >= 0 && m_iSelected < (int) m_Items.GetSize() )
03381     {
03382         DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt( m_iSelected );
03383         if( pItem != NULL )
03384         {
03385             m_pDialog->DrawText( pItem->strText, pElement, &m_rcText );
03386         
03387         }
03388     }
03389 }
03390 
03391 
03392 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03393 HRESULT CDXUTComboBox::AddItem( const WCHAR* strText, void* pData )
03394 {
03395     // Validate parameters
03396     if( strText== NULL )
03397     {
03398         return E_INVALIDARG;
03399     }
03400     
03401     // Create a new item and set the data
03402     DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = DX_NEW DXUTComboBoxItem;
03403     if( pItem == NULL )
03404     {
03405         return DXTRACE_ERR_MSGBOX( L"new", E_OUTOFMEMORY );
03406     }
03407     
03408     ZeroMemory( pItem, sizeof(DXUTComboBoxItem) );
03409     StringCchCopy( pItem->strText, 256, strText );
03410     pItem->pData = pData;
03411 
03412     m_Items.Add( pItem );
03413 
03414     // Update the scroll bar with new range
03415     m_ScrollBar.SetTrackRange( 0, m_Items.GetSize() );
03416 
03417     // If this is the only item in the list, it's selected
03418     if( GetNumItems() == 1 )
03419     {
03420         m_iSelected = 0;
03421         m_iFocused = 0;
03422         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, false, this );
03423     }
03424 
03425     return S_OK;
03426 }
03427 
03428 
03429 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03430 void CDXUTComboBox::RemoveItem( UINT index )
03431 {
03432     DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt( index );
03433     SAFE_DELETE( pItem );
03434     m_Items.Remove( index );
03435     m_ScrollBar.SetTrackRange( 0, m_Items.GetSize() );
03436     if( m_iSelected >= m_Items.GetSize() )
03437         m_iSelected = m_Items.GetSize() - 1;
03438 }
03439 
03440 
03441 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03442 void CDXUTComboBox::RemoveAllItems()
03443 {
03444     for( int i=0; i < m_Items.GetSize(); i++ )
03445     {
03446         DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
03447         SAFE_DELETE( pItem );
03448     }
03449 
03450     m_Items.RemoveAll();
03451     m_ScrollBar.SetTrackRange( 0, 1 );
03452     m_iFocused = m_iSelected = -1;
03453 }

03457 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03458 bool CDXUTComboBox::ContainsItem( const WCHAR* strText, UINT iStart )
03459 {
03460     return ( -1 != FindItem( strText, iStart ) );
03461 }

03463 
03464 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03465 int CDXUTComboBox::FindItem( const WCHAR* strText, UINT iStart )
03466 {
03467     if( strText == NULL )
03468         return -1;
03469 
03470     for( int i = iStart; i < m_Items.GetSize(); i++ )
03471     {
03472         DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt(i);
03473 
03474         if( 0 == wcscmp( pItem->strText, strText ) )
03475         {
03476             return i;
03477         }
03478     }
03479 
03480     return -1;
03481 }
03482

03486 {
03487     if( m_iSelected < 0 )
03488         return NULL;
03489 
03490     DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt( m_iSelected );
03491     return pItem->pData;
03492 }
03493 
03494 
03495 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03496 DXUTComboBoxItem* CDXUTComboBox::GetSelectedItem()
03497 {
03498     if( m_iSelected < 0 )
03499         return NULL;
03500 
03501     return m_Items.GetAt( m_iSelected );
03502 }

03505 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03506 void* CDXUTComboBox::GetItemData( const WCHAR* strText )
03507 {
03508     int index = FindItem( strText );
03509     if( index == -1 )
03510     {
03511         return NULL;
03512     }
03513 
03514     DXUTComboBoxItem* pItem = m_Items.GetAt(index);
03515     if( pItem == NULL )
03516     {
03517         DXTRACE_ERR( L"CGrowableArray::GetAt", E_FAIL );
03518         return NULL;
03519     }
03520 
03521     return pItem->pData;
03522 }

03532 }

03556     if( index == -1 )

03577             m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_COMBOBOX_SELECTION_CHANGED, false, this );
03578             return S_OK;
03579         }

03581 
03582     return E_FAIL;

03587 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03588 CDXUTSlider::CDXUTSlider( CDXUTDialog *pDialog )
03589 {
03590     m_Type = DXUT_CONTROL_SLIDER;
03591     m_pDialog = pDialog;
03592 
03593     m_nMin = 0;
03594     m_nMax = 100;
03595     m_nValue = 50;
03596 
03597     m_bPressed = false;
03598 }
03599 
03600 
03601 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03602 BOOL CDXUTSlider::ContainsPoint( POINT pt ) 
03603 { 
03604     return ( PtInRect( &m_rcBoundingBox, pt ) || 
03605              PtInRect( &m_rcButton, pt ) ); 
03606 }
03607 
03608 
03609 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03610 void CDXUTSlider::UpdateRects()
03611 {
03612     CDXUTControl::UpdateRects();
03613 
03614     m_rcButton = m_rcBoundingBox;
03615     m_rcButton.right = m_rcButton.left + RectHeight( m_rcButton );
03616     OffsetRect( &m_rcButton, -RectWidth( m_rcButton )/2, 0 );
03617 
03618     m_nButtonX = (int) ( (m_nValue - m_nMin) * (float)RectWidth( m_rcBoundingBox ) / (m_nMax - m_nMin) );
03619     OffsetRect( &m_rcButton, m_nButtonX, 0 );
03620 }
03621 
03622 int CDXUTSlider::ValueFromPos( int x )
03623 { 
03624     float fValuePerPixel = (float)(m_nMax - m_nMin) / RectWidth( m_rcBoundingBox );
03625     return (int) (0.5f + m_nMin + fValuePerPixel * (x - m_rcBoundingBox.left)) ; 
03626 }
03627 
03628 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03629 bool CDXUTSlider::HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
03630 {
03631     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
03632         return false;
03633 
03634     switch( uMsg )
03635     {
03636         case WM_KEYDOWN:
03637         {
03638             switch( wParam )
03639             {
03640                 case VK_HOME:
03641                     SetValueInternal( m_nMin, true );
03642                     return true;
03643 
03644                 case VK_END:
03645                     SetValueInternal( m_nMax, true );
03646                     return true;
03647 
03648                 case VK_LEFT:
03649                 case VK_DOWN:
03650                     SetValueInternal( m_nValue - 1, true );
03651                     return true;
03652 
03653                 case VK_RIGHT:
03654                 case VK_UP:
03655                     SetValueInternal( m_nValue + 1, true );
03656                     return true;
03657 
03658                 case VK_NEXT:
03659                     SetValueInternal( m_nValue - ( 10 > (m_nMax - m_nMin) / 10 ? 10 : (m_nMax - m_nMin) / 10 ), true );
03660                     return true;
03661 
03662                 case VK_PRIOR:
03663                     SetValueInternal( m_nValue + ( 10 > (m_nMax - m_nMin) / 10 ? 10 : (m_nMax - m_nMin) / 10 ), true );
03664                     return true;
03665             }
03666             break;
03667         }
03668     }
03669     
03670 
03671     return false;
03672 }
03673 
03674 
03675 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03676 bool CDXUTSlider::HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
03677 {
03678     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
03679         return false;
03680 
03681     switch( uMsg )
03682     {
03683         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
03684         case WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK:
03685         {
03686             if( PtInRect( &m_rcButton, pt ) )
03687             {
03688                 // Pressed while inside the control
03689                 m_bPressed = true;
03690                 SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
03691 
03692                 m_nDragX = pt.x;
03693                 //m_nDragY = pt.y;
03694                 m_nDragOffset = m_nButtonX - m_nDragX;
03695 
03696                 //m_nDragValue = m_nValue;
03697 
03698                 if( !m_bHasFocus )
03699                     m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this );
03700 
03701                 return true;
03702             }
03703 
03704             if( PtInRect( &m_rcBoundingBox, pt ) )
03705             {
03706                 m_nDragX = pt.x;
03707                 m_nDragOffset = 0;               
03708                 m_bPressed = true;
03709                 
03710                 if( !m_bHasFocus )
03711                     m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this );
03712 
03713                 if( pt.x > m_nButtonX + m_x )
03714                 {
03715                     SetValueInternal( m_nValue + 1, true );
03716                     return true;
03717                 }
03718 
03719                 if( pt.x < m_nButtonX + m_x )
03720                 {
03721                     SetValueInternal( m_nValue - 1, true );
03722                     return true;
03723                 }
03724             }
03725 
03726             break;
03727         }
03728 
03729         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
03730         {
03731             if( m_bPressed )
03732             {
03733                 m_bPressed = false;
03734                 ReleaseCapture();
03735                 m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_SLIDER_VALUE_CHANGED, true, this );
03736 
03737                 return true;
03738             }
03739 
03740             break;
03741         }
03742 
03743         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
03744         {
03745             if( m_bPressed )
03746             {
03747                 SetValueInternal( ValueFromPos( m_x + pt.x + m_nDragOffset ), true );
03748                 return true;
03749             }
03750 
03751             break;
03752         }
03753 
03754             case WM_MOUSEWHEEL:
03755             {
03756                 UINT uLines;
03757                 SystemParametersInfo( SPI_GETWHEELSCROLLLINES, 0, &uLines, 0 );
03758                 int nScrollAmount = int((short)HIWORD(wParam)) / WHEEL_DELTA * uLines;
03759             SetValueInternal( m_nValue - nScrollAmount, true );
03760                 return true;
03761             }
03762     };
03763     
03764     return false;
03765 }
03766 
03767 
03768 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03769 void CDXUTSlider::SetRange( int nMin, int nMax ) 
03770 {
03771     m_nMin = nMin;
03772     m_nMax = nMax;
03773 
03774     SetValueInternal( m_nValue, false );
03775 }
03776 
03777 
03778 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03779 void CDXUTSlider::SetValueInternal( int nValue, bool bFromInput )
03780 {
03781     // Clamp to range
03782     nValue = __max( m_nMin, nValue );
03783     nValue = __min( m_nMax, nValue );
03784     
03785     if( nValue == m_nValue )
03786         return;
03787 
03788     m_nValue = nValue;
03789     UpdateRects();
03790 
03791     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_SLIDER_VALUE_CHANGED, bFromInput, this );
03792 }
03793 
03794 
03795 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03796 void CDXUTSlider::Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime )
03797 {
03798     int nOffsetX = 0;
03799     int nOffsetY = 0;
03800 
03801     DXUT_CONTROL_STATE iState = DXUT_STATE_NORMAL;
03802 
03803     if( m_bVisible == false )
03804     {
03805         iState = DXUT_STATE_HIDDEN;
03806     }
03807     else if( m_bEnabled == false )
03808     {
03809         iState = DXUT_STATE_DISABLED;
03810     }
03811     else if( m_bPressed )
03812     {
03813         iState = DXUT_STATE_PRESSED;
03814 
03815         nOffsetX = 1;
03816         nOffsetY = 2;
03817     }
03818     else if( m_bMouseOver )
03819     {
03820         iState = DXUT_STATE_MOUSEOVER;
03821         
03822         nOffsetX = -1;
03823         nOffsetY = -2;
03824     }
03825     else if( m_bHasFocus )
03826     {
03827         iState = DXUT_STATE_FOCUS;
03828     }
03829 
03830     float fBlendRate = ( iState == DXUT_STATE_PRESSED ) ? 0.0f : 0.8f;
03831 
03832     CDXUTElement* pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 0 );
03833     
03834     // Blend current color
03835     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate ); 
03836     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcBoundingBox );
03837 
03838     //TODO: remove magic numbers
03839     pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 1 );
03840        
03841     // Blend current color
03842     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
03843     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcButton );
03844 }

03847 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03848 // CDXUTScrollBar class
03849 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03850 
03851 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03852 CDXUTScrollBar::CDXUTScrollBar( CDXUTDialog *pDialog )
03853 {
03854     m_Type = DXUT_CONTROL_SCROLLBAR;
03855     m_pDialog = pDialog;
03856 
03857     m_bShowThumb = true;
03858 
03859     SetRect( &m_rcUpButton, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
03860     SetRect( &m_rcDownButton, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
03861     SetRect( &m_rcTrack, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
03862     SetRect( &m_rcThumb, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
03863     m_nPosition = 0;
03864     m_nPageSize = 1;
03865     m_nStart = 0;
03866     m_nEnd = 1;
03867     m_Arrow = CLEAR;
03868     m_dArrowTS = 0.0;
03869 }
03870 
03871 
03872 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03873 CDXUTScrollBar::~CDXUTScrollBar()
03874 {
03875 }
03876 
03877 
03878 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03879 void CDXUTScrollBar::UpdateRects()
03880 {
03881     CDXUTControl::UpdateRects();
03882 
03883     // Make the buttons square
03884 
03885     SetRect( &m_rcUpButton, m_rcBoundingBox.left, m_rcBoundingBox.top,
03886                             m_rcBoundingBox.right, m_rcBoundingBox.top + RectWidth( m_rcBoundingBox ) );
03887     SetRect( &m_rcDownButton, m_rcBoundingBox.left, m_rcBoundingBox.bottom - RectWidth( m_rcBoundingBox ),
03888                               m_rcBoundingBox.right, m_rcBoundingBox.bottom );
03889     SetRect( &m_rcTrack, m_rcUpButton.left, m_rcUpButton.bottom,
03890                          m_rcDownButton.right, m_rcDownButton.top );
03891     m_rcThumb.left = m_rcUpButton.left;
03892     m_rcThumb.right = m_rcUpButton.right;
03893 
03894     UpdateThumbRect();
03895 }
03896 
03897 
03898 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03899 // Compute the dimension of the scroll thumb
03900 void CDXUTScrollBar::UpdateThumbRect()
03901 {
03902     if( m_nEnd - m_nStart > m_nPageSize )
03903     {
03904         int nThumbHeight = __max( RectHeight( m_rcTrack ) * m_nPageSize / ( m_nEnd - m_nStart ), SCROLLBAR_MINTHUMBSIZE );
03905         int nMaxPosition = m_nEnd - m_nStart - m_nPageSize;
03906         m_rcThumb.top = m_rcTrack.top + ( m_nPosition - m_nStart ) * ( RectHeight( m_rcTrack ) - nThumbHeight )
03907                         / nMaxPosition;
03908         m_rcThumb.bottom = m_rcThumb.top + nThumbHeight;
03909         m_bShowThumb = true;
03910 
03911     } 
03912     else
03913     {
03914         // No content to scroll
03915         m_rcThumb.bottom = m_rcThumb.top;
03916         m_bShowThumb = false;
03917     }
03918 }
03919 
03920 
03921 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03922 // Scroll() scrolls by nDelta items.  A positive value scrolls down, while a negative
03923 // value scrolls up.
03924 void CDXUTScrollBar::Scroll( int nDelta )
03925 {
03926     // Perform scroll
03927     m_nPosition += nDelta;
03928 
03929     // Cap position
03930     Cap();
03931 
03932     // Update thumb position
03933     UpdateThumbRect();
03934 }
03935 
03936 
03937 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03938 void CDXUTScrollBar::ShowItem( int nIndex )
03939 {
03940     // Cap the index
03941 
03942     if( nIndex < 0 )
03943         nIndex = 0;
03944 
03945     if( nIndex >= m_nEnd )
03946         nIndex = m_nEnd - 1;
03947 
03948     // Adjust position
03949 
03950     if( m_nPosition > nIndex )
03951         m_nPosition = nIndex;
03952     else
03953     if( m_nPosition + m_nPageSize <= nIndex )
03954         m_nPosition = nIndex - m_nPageSize + 1;
03955 
03956     UpdateThumbRect();
03957 }
03958 
03959 
03960 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03961 bool CDXUTScrollBar::HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
03962 {
03963     return false;
03964 }
03965 
03966 
03967 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
03968 bool CDXUTScrollBar::HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
03969 {
03970     static int ThumbOffsetY;
03971     static bool bDrag;
03972 
03973     m_LastMouse = pt;
03974     switch( uMsg )
03975     {
03976         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
03977         case WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK:
03978         {
03979             // Check for click on up button
03980 
03981             if( PtInRect( &m_rcUpButton, pt ) )
03982             {
03983                 SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
03984                 if( m_nPosition > m_nStart )
03985                     --m_nPosition;
03986                 UpdateThumbRect();
03987                 m_Arrow = CLICKED_UP;
03988                 m_dArrowTS = DXUTGetTime();
03989                 return true;
03990             }
03991 
03992             // Check for click on down button
03993 
03994             if( PtInRect( &m_rcDownButton, pt ) )
03995             {
03996                 SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
03997                 if( m_nPosition + m_nPageSize < m_nEnd )
03998                     ++m_nPosition;
03999                 UpdateThumbRect();
04000                 m_Arrow = CLICKED_DOWN;
04001                 m_dArrowTS = DXUTGetTime();
04002                 return true;
04003             }
04004 
04005             // Check for click on thumb
04006 
04007             if( PtInRect( &m_rcThumb, pt ) )
04008             {
04009                 SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
04010                 bDrag = true;
04011                 ThumbOffsetY = pt.y - m_rcThumb.top;
04012                 return true;
04013             }
04014 
04015             // Check for click on track
04016 
04017             if( m_rcThumb.left <= pt.x &&
04018                 m_rcThumb.right > pt.x )
04019             {
04020                 SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
04021                 if( m_rcThumb.top > pt.y &&
04022                     m_rcTrack.top <= pt.y )
04023                 {
04024                     Scroll( -( m_nPageSize - 1 ) );
04025                     return true;
04026                 } else
04027                 if( m_rcThumb.bottom <= pt.y &&
04028                     m_rcTrack.bottom > pt.y )
04029                 {
04030                     Scroll( m_nPageSize - 1 );
04031                     return true;
04032                 }
04033             }
04034 
04035             break;
04036         }
04037 
04038         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
04039         {
04040             bDrag = false;
04041             ReleaseCapture();
04042             UpdateThumbRect();
04043             m_Arrow = CLEAR;
04044             break;
04045         }
04046 
04047         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
04048         {
04049             if( bDrag )
04050             {
04051                 m_rcThumb.bottom += pt.y - ThumbOffsetY - m_rcThumb.top;
04052                 m_rcThumb.top = pt.y - ThumbOffsetY;
04053                 if( m_rcThumb.top < m_rcTrack.top )
04054                     OffsetRect( &m_rcThumb, 0, m_rcTrack.top - m_rcThumb.top );
04055                 else
04056                 if( m_rcThumb.bottom > m_rcTrack.bottom )
04057                     OffsetRect( &m_rcThumb, 0, m_rcTrack.bottom - m_rcThumb.bottom );
04058 
04059                 // Compute first item index based on thumb position
04060 
04061                 int nMaxFirstItem = m_nEnd - m_nStart - m_nPageSize;  // Largest possible index for first item
04062                 int nMaxThumb = RectHeight( m_rcTrack ) - RectHeight( m_rcThumb );  // Largest possible thumb position from the top
04063 
04064                 m_nPosition = m_nStart +
04065                               ( m_rcThumb.top - m_rcTrack.top +
04066                                 nMaxThumb / ( nMaxFirstItem * 2 ) ) * // Shift by half a row to avoid last row covered by only one pixel
04067                               nMaxFirstItem  / nMaxThumb;
04068 
04069                 return true;
04070             }
04071 
04072             break;
04073         }
04074     }
04075 
04076     return false;
04077 }
04078 
04079 
04080 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04081 void CDXUTScrollBar::Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime )
04082 {
04083     // Check if the arrow button has been held for a while.
04084     // If so, update the thumb position to simulate repeated
04085     // scroll.
04086     if( m_Arrow != CLEAR )
04087     {
04088         double dCurrTime = DXUTGetTime();
04089         if( PtInRect( &m_rcUpButton, m_LastMouse ) )
04090         {
04091             switch( m_Arrow )
04092             {
04093                 case CLICKED_UP:
04094                     if( SCROLLBAR_ARROWCLICK_DELAY < dCurrTime - m_dArrowTS )
04095                     {
04096                         Scroll( -1 );
04097                         m_Arrow = HELD_UP;
04098                         m_dArrowTS = dCurrTime;
04099                     }
04100                     break;
04101                 case HELD_UP:
04102                     if( SCROLLBAR_ARROWCLICK_REPEAT < dCurrTime - m_dArrowTS )
04103                     {
04104                         Scroll( -1 );
04105                         m_dArrowTS = dCurrTime;
04106                     }
04107                     break;
04108             }
04109         } else
04110         if( PtInRect( &m_rcDownButton, m_LastMouse ) )
04111         {
04112             switch( m_Arrow )
04113             {
04114                 case CLICKED_DOWN:
04115                     if( SCROLLBAR_ARROWCLICK_DELAY < dCurrTime - m_dArrowTS )
04116                     {
04117                         Scroll( 1 );
04118                         m_Arrow = HELD_DOWN;
04119                         m_dArrowTS = dCurrTime;
04120                     }
04121                     break;
04122                 case HELD_DOWN:
04123                     if( SCROLLBAR_ARROWCLICK_REPEAT < dCurrTime - m_dArrowTS )
04124                     {
04125                         Scroll( 1 );
04126                         m_dArrowTS = dCurrTime;
04127                     }
04128                     break;
04129             }
04130         }
04131     }
04132 
04133     DXUT_CONTROL_STATE iState = DXUT_STATE_NORMAL;
04134 
04135     if( m_bVisible == false )
04136         iState = DXUT_STATE_HIDDEN;
04137     else if( m_bEnabled == false || m_bShowThumb == false )
04138         iState = DXUT_STATE_DISABLED;
04139     else if( m_bMouseOver )
04140         iState = DXUT_STATE_MOUSEOVER;
04141     else if( m_bHasFocus )
04142         iState = DXUT_STATE_FOCUS;
04143 
04144 
04145     float fBlendRate = ( iState == DXUT_STATE_PRESSED ) ? 0.0f : 0.8f;
04146 
04147     // Background track layer
04148     CDXUTElement* pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 0 );
04149     
04150     // Blend current color
04151     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
04152     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcTrack );
04153 
04154     // Up Arrow
04155     pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 1 );
04156     
04157     // Blend current color
04158     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
04159     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcUpButton );
04160 
04161     // Down Arrow
04162     pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 2 );
04163     
04164     // Blend current color
04165     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
04166     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcDownButton );
04167 
04168     // Thumb button
04169     pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 3 );
04170     
04171     // Blend current color
04172     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( iState, fElapsedTime, fBlendRate );
04173     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcThumb );
04174  
04175 }
04176 
04177 
04178 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04179 void CDXUTScrollBar::SetTrackRange( int nStart, int nEnd )
04180 {
04181     m_nStart = nStart; m_nEnd = nEnd;
04182     Cap();
04183     UpdateThumbRect();
04184 }
04185 
04186 
04187 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04188 void CDXUTScrollBar::Cap()  // Clips position at boundaries. Ensures it stays within legal range.
04189 {
04190     if( m_nPosition < m_nStart ||
04191         m_nEnd - m_nStart <= m_nPageSize )
04192     {
04193         m_nPosition = m_nStart;
04194     }
04195     else
04196     if( m_nPosition + m_nPageSize > m_nEnd )
04197         m_nPosition = m_nEnd - m_nPageSize;
04198 }

04204 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04205 CDXUTListBox::CDXUTListBox( CDXUTDialog *pDialog ) :
04206     m_ScrollBar( pDialog )
04207 {
04208     m_Type = DXUT_CONTROL_LISTBOX;
04209     m_pDialog = pDialog;
04210 
04211     m_dwStyle = 0;
04212     m_nSBWidth = 16;
04213     m_nSelected = -1;
04214     m_nSelStart = 0;
04215     m_bDrag = false;
04216     m_nBorder = 6;
04217     m_nMargin = 5;
04218     m_nTextHeight = 0;
04219 }
04220 
04221 
04222 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04223 CDXUTListBox::~CDXUTListBox()
04224 {
04225     RemoveAllItems();
04226 }
04227 
04228 
04229 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04230 void CDXUTListBox::UpdateRects()
04231 {
04232     CDXUTControl::UpdateRects();
04233 
04234     m_rcSelection = m_rcBoundingBox;
04235     m_rcSelection.right -= m_nSBWidth;
04236     InflateRect( &m_rcSelection, -m_nBorder, -m_nBorder );
04237     m_rcText = m_rcSelection;
04238     InflateRect( &m_rcText, -m_nMargin, 0 );
04239 
04240     // Update the scrollbar's rects
04241     m_ScrollBar.SetLocation( m_rcBoundingBox.right - m_nSBWidth, m_rcBoundingBox.top );
04242     m_ScrollBar.SetSize( m_nSBWidth, m_height );
04243     DXUTFontNode* pFontNode = m_pDialog->GetManager()->GetFontNode( m_Elements.GetAt( 0 )->iFont );
04244     if( pFontNode && pFontNode->nHeight )
04245     {
04246         m_ScrollBar.SetPageSize( RectHeight( m_rcText ) / pFontNode->nHeight );
04247 
04248         // The selected item may have been scrolled off the page.
04249         // Ensure that it is in page again.
04250         m_ScrollBar.ShowItem( m_nSelected );
04251     }
04252 }

04255 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04256 HRESULT CDXUTListBox::AddItem( const WCHAR *wszText, void *pData )
04257 {
04258     DXUTListBoxItem *pNewItem = new DXUTListBoxItem;
04259     if( !pNewItem )
04260         return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
04261 
04262     StringCchCopy( pNewItem->strText, 256, wszText );
04263     pNewItem->pData = pData;
04264     SetRect( &pNewItem->rcActive, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
04265     pNewItem->bSelected = false;
04266 
04267     HRESULT hr = m_Items.Add( pNewItem );
04268     if( FAILED(hr) )
04269     {
04270         SAFE_DELETE( pNewItem );
04271     }
04272     else
04273     {
04274         m_ScrollBar.SetTrackRange( 0, m_Items.GetSize() );
04275     }
04276 
04277     return hr;
04278 }
04279 
04280 
04281 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04282 HRESULT CDXUTListBox::InsertItem( int nIndex, const WCHAR *wszText, void *pData )
04283 {
04284     DXUTListBoxItem *pNewItem = DX_NEW DXUTListBoxItem;
04285     if( !pNewItem )
04286         return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
04287 
04288     StringCchCopy( pNewItem->strText, 256, wszText );
04289     pNewItem->pData = pData;
04290     SetRect( &pNewItem->rcActive, 0, 0, 0, 0 );
04291     pNewItem->bSelected = false;
04292 
04293     HRESULT hr = m_Items.Insert( nIndex, pNewItem );
04294     if( SUCCEEDED( hr ) )
04295         m_ScrollBar.SetTrackRange( 0, m_Items.GetSize() );
04296     else
04297         SAFE_DELETE( pNewItem );
04298 
04299     return hr;
04300 }

04303 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04304 void CDXUTListBox::RemoveItem( int nIndex )
04305 {
04306     if( nIndex < 0 || nIndex >= (int)m_Items.GetSize() )
04307         return;
04308 
04309     DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( nIndex );
04310 
04311     delete pItem;
04312     m_Items.Remove( nIndex );
04313     m_ScrollBar.SetTrackRange( 0, m_Items.GetSize() );
04314     if( m_nSelected >= (int)m_Items.GetSize() )
04315         m_nSelected = m_Items.GetSize() - 1;
04316 
04317     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04318 }

04324 }

04329 {
04330 }

04333 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04334 void CDXUTListBox::RemoveAllItems()
04335 {
04336     for( int i = 0; i < m_Items.GetSize(); ++i )
04337     {
04338         DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04339         delete pItem;
04340     }
04341 
04342     m_Items.RemoveAll();
04343     m_ScrollBar.SetTrackRange( 0, 1 );
04344 }

04347 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04348 DXUTListBoxItem *CDXUTListBox::GetItem( int nIndex )
04349 {
04350     if( nIndex < 0 || nIndex >= (int)m_Items.GetSize() )
04351         return NULL;
04352 
04353     return m_Items[nIndex];
04354 }
04355 
04356 
04357 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04358 // For single-selection listbox, returns the index of the selected item.
04359 // For multi-selection, returns the first selected item after the nPreviousSelected position.
04360 // To search for the first selected item, the app passes -1 for nPreviousSelected.  For
04361 // subsequent searches, the app passes the returned index back to GetSelectedIndex as.
04362 // nPreviousSelected.
04363 // Returns -1 on error or if no item is selected.
04364 int CDXUTListBox::GetSelectedIndex( int nPreviousSelected )
04365 {
04366     if( nPreviousSelected < -1 )
04367         return -1;
04368 
04369     if( m_dwStyle & MULTISELECTION )
04370     {
04371         // Multiple selection enabled. Search for the next item with the selected flag.
04372         for( int i = nPreviousSelected + 1; i < (int)m_Items.GetSize(); ++i )
04373         {
04374             DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04375 
04376             if( pItem->bSelected )
04377                 return i;
04378         }
04379 
04380         return -1;
04381     }
04382     else
04383     {
04384         // Single selection
04385         return m_nSelected;
04386     }
04387 }
04388 
04389 
04390 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04391 void CDXUTListBox::SelectItem( int nNewIndex )
04392 {
04393     // If no item exists, do nothing.
04394     if( m_Items.GetSize() == 0 )
04395         return;
04396 
04397     int nOldSelected = m_nSelected;
04398 
04399     // Adjust m_nSelected
04400     m_nSelected = nNewIndex;
04401 
04402     // Perform capping
04403     if( m_nSelected < 0 )
04404         m_nSelected = 0;
04405     if( m_nSelected >= (int)m_Items.GetSize() )
04406         m_nSelected = m_Items.GetSize() - 1;
04407 
04408     if( nOldSelected != m_nSelected )
04409     {
04410         if( m_dwStyle & MULTISELECTION )
04411         {
04412             m_Items[m_nSelected]->bSelected = true;
04413         }
04414 
04415         // Update selection start
04416         m_nSelStart = m_nSelected;
04417 
04418         // Adjust scroll bar
04419         m_ScrollBar.ShowItem( m_nSelected );
04420     }
04421 
04422     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04423 }
04424 
04425 
04426 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04427 bool CDXUTListBox::HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
04428 {
04429     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
04430         return false;
04431 
04432     // Let the scroll bar have a chance to handle it first
04433     if( m_ScrollBar.HandleKeyboard( uMsg, wParam, lParam ) )
04434         return true;
04435 
04436     switch( uMsg )
04437     {
04438         case WM_KEYDOWN:
04439             switch( wParam )
04440             {
04441                 case VK_UP:
04442                 case VK_DOWN:
04443                 case VK_NEXT:
04444                 case VK_PRIOR:
04445                 case VK_HOME:
04446                 case VK_END:
04447                 {
04448                     // If no item exists, do nothing.
04449                     if( m_Items.GetSize() == 0 )
04450                         return true;
04451 
04452                     int nOldSelected = m_nSelected;
04453 
04454                     // Adjust m_nSelected
04455                     switch( wParam )
04456                     {
04457                         case VK_UP: --m_nSelected; break;
04458                         case VK_DOWN: ++m_nSelected; break;
04459                         case VK_NEXT: m_nSelected += m_ScrollBar.GetPageSize() - 1; break;
04460                         case VK_PRIOR: m_nSelected -= m_ScrollBar.GetPageSize() - 1; break;
04461                         case VK_HOME: m_nSelected = 0; break;
04462                         case VK_END: m_nSelected = m_Items.GetSize() - 1; break;
04463                     }
04464 
04465                     // Perform capping
04466                     if( m_nSelected < 0 )
04467                         m_nSelected = 0;
04468                     if( m_nSelected >= (int)m_Items.GetSize() )
04469                         m_nSelected = m_Items.GetSize() - 1;
04470 
04471                     if( nOldSelected != m_nSelected )
04472                     {
04473                         if( m_dwStyle & MULTISELECTION )
04474                         {
04475                             // Multiple selection
04476 
04477                             // Clear all selection
04478                             for( int i = 0; i < (int)m_Items.GetSize(); ++i )
04479                             {
04480                                 DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items[i];
04481                                 pItem->bSelected = false;
04482                             }
04483 
04484                             if( GetKeyState( VK_SHIFT ) < 0 )
04485                             {
04486                                 // Select all items from m_nSelStart to
04487                                 // m_nSelected
04488                                 int nEnd = __max( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected );
04489 
04490                                 for( int n = __min( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected ); n <= nEnd; ++n )
04491                                     m_Items[n]->bSelected = true;
04492                             }
04493                             else
04494                             {
04495                                 m_Items[m_nSelected]->bSelected = true;
04496 
04497                                 // Update selection start
04498                                 m_nSelStart = m_nSelected;
04499                             }
04500                         } else
04501                             m_nSelStart = m_nSelected;
04502 
04503                         // Adjust scroll bar
04504 
04505                         m_ScrollBar.ShowItem( m_nSelected );
04506 
04507                         // Send notification
04508 
04509                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04510                     }
04511                     return true;
04512                 }
04513 
04514                 // Space is the hotkey for double-clicking an item.
04515                 //
04516                 case VK_SPACE:
04517                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_ITEM_DBLCLK, true, this );
04518                     return true;
04519             }
04520             break;
04521     }
04522 
04523     return false;
04524 }
04525 
04526 
04527 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04528 bool CDXUTListBox::HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
04529 {
04530     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
04531         return false;
04532 
04533     // First acquire focus
04534     if( WM_LBUTTONDOWN == uMsg )
04535         if( !m_bHasFocus )
04536             m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this );
04537 
04538     // Let the scroll bar handle it first.
04539     if( m_ScrollBar.HandleMouse( uMsg, pt, wParam, lParam ) )
04540         return true;
04541 
04542     switch( uMsg )
04543     {
04544         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
04545         case WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK:
04546             // Check for clicks in the text area
04547             if( m_Items.GetSize() > 0 && PtInRect( &m_rcSelection, pt ) )
04548             {
04549                 // Compute the index of the clicked item
04550 
04551                 int nClicked;
04552                 if( m_nTextHeight )
04553                     nClicked = m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() + ( pt.y - m_rcText.top ) / m_nTextHeight;
04554                 else
04555                     nClicked = -1;
04556 
04557                 // Only proceed if the click falls on top of an item.
04558 
04559                 if( nClicked >= m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() &&
04560                     nClicked < (int)m_Items.GetSize() &&
04561                     nClicked < m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() + m_ScrollBar.GetPageSize() )
04562                 {
04563                     SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
04564                     m_bDrag = true;
04565 
04566                     // If this is a double click, fire off an event and exit
04567                     // since the first click would have taken care of the selection
04568                     // updating.
04569                     if( uMsg == WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK )
04570                     {
04571                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_ITEM_DBLCLK, true, this );
04572                         return true;
04573                     }
04574 
04575                     m_nSelected = nClicked;
04576                     if( !( wParam & MK_SHIFT ) )
04577                         m_nSelStart = m_nSelected;
04578 
04579                     // If this is a multi-selection listbox, update per-item
04580                     // selection data.
04581 
04582                     if( m_dwStyle & MULTISELECTION )
04583                     {
04584                         // Determine behavior based on the state of Shift and Ctrl
04585 
04586                         DXUTListBoxItem *pSelItem = m_Items.GetAt( m_nSelected );
04587                         if( ( wParam & (MK_SHIFT|MK_CONTROL) ) == MK_CONTROL )
04588                         {
04589                             // Control click. Reverse the selection of this item.
04590 
04591                             pSelItem->bSelected = !pSelItem->bSelected;
04592                         } else
04593                         if( ( wParam & (MK_SHIFT|MK_CONTROL) ) == MK_SHIFT )
04594                         {
04595                             // Shift click. Set the selection for all items
04596                             // from last selected item to the current item.
04597                             // Clear everything else.
04598 
04599                             int nBegin = __min( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected );
04600                             int nEnd = __max( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected );
04601 
04602                             for( int i = 0; i < nBegin; ++i )
04603                             {
04604                                 DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04605                                 pItem->bSelected = false;
04606                             }
04607 
04608                             for( int i = nEnd + 1; i < (int)m_Items.GetSize(); ++i )
04609                             {
04610                                 DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04611                                 pItem->bSelected = false;
04612                             }
04613 
04614                             for( int i = nBegin; i <= nEnd; ++i )
04615                             {
04616                                 DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04617                                 pItem->bSelected = true;
04618                             }
04619                         } else
04620                         if( ( wParam & (MK_SHIFT|MK_CONTROL) ) == ( MK_SHIFT|MK_CONTROL ) )
04621                         {
04622                             // Control-Shift-click.
04623 
04624                             // The behavior is:
04625                             //   Set all items from m_nSelStart to m_nSelected to
04626                             //     the same state as m_nSelStart, not including m_nSelected.
04627                             //   Set m_nSelected to selected.
04628 
04629                             int nBegin = __min( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected );
04630                             int nEnd = __max( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected );
04631 
04632                             // The two ends do not need to be set here.
04633 
04634                             bool bLastSelected = m_Items.GetAt( m_nSelStart )->bSelected;
04635                             for( int i = nBegin + 1; i < nEnd; ++i )
04636                             {
04637                                 DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04638                                 pItem->bSelected = bLastSelected;
04639                             }
04640 
04641                             pSelItem->bSelected = true;
04642 
04643                             // Restore m_nSelected to the previous value
04644                             // This matches the Windows behavior
04645 
04646                             m_nSelected = m_nSelStart;
04647                         } else
04648                         {
04649                             // Simple click.  Clear all items and select the clicked
04650                             // item.
04651 
04652 
04653                             for( int i = 0; i < (int)m_Items.GetSize(); ++i )
04654                             {
04655                                 DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04656                                 pItem->bSelected = false;
04657                             }
04658 
04659                             pSelItem->bSelected = true;
04660                         }
04661                     }  // End of multi-selection case
04662 
04663                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04664                 }
04665 
04666                 return true;
04667             }
04668             break;
04669 
04670         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
04671         {
04672             ReleaseCapture();
04673             m_bDrag = false;
04674 
04675             if( m_nSelected != -1 )
04676             {
04677                 // Set all items between m_nSelStart and m_nSelected to
04678                 // the same state as m_nSelStart
04679                 int nEnd = __max( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected );
04680 
04681                 for( int n = __min( m_nSelStart, m_nSelected ) + 1; n < nEnd; ++n )
04682                     m_Items[n]->bSelected = m_Items[m_nSelStart]->bSelected;
04683                 m_Items[m_nSelected]->bSelected = m_Items[m_nSelStart]->bSelected;
04684 
04685                 // If m_nSelStart and m_nSelected are not the same,
04686                 // the user has dragged the mouse to make a selection.
04687                 // Notify the application of this.
04688                 if( m_nSelStart != m_nSelected )
04689                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04690             }
04691             return false;
04692         }
04693 
04694         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
04695             if( m_bDrag )
04696             {
04697                 // Compute the index of the item below cursor
04698 
04699                 int nItem;
04700                 if( m_nTextHeight )
04701                     nItem = m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() + ( pt.y - m_rcText.top ) / m_nTextHeight;
04702                 else
04703                     nItem = -1;
04704 
04705                 // Only proceed if the cursor is on top of an item.
04706 
04707                 if( nItem >= (int)m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() &&
04708                     nItem < (int)m_Items.GetSize() &&
04709                     nItem < m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() + m_ScrollBar.GetPageSize() )
04710                 {
04711                     m_nSelected = nItem;
04712                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04713                 } else
04714                 if( nItem < (int)m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() )
04715                 {
04716                     // User drags the mouse above window top
04717                     m_ScrollBar.Scroll( -1 );
04718                     m_nSelected = m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos();
04719                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04720                 } else
04721                 if( nItem >= m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() + m_ScrollBar.GetPageSize() )
04722                 {
04723                     // User drags the mouse below window bottom
04724                     m_ScrollBar.Scroll( 1 );
04725                     m_nSelected = __min( (int)m_Items.GetSize(), m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos() + m_ScrollBar.GetPageSize() ) - 1;
04726                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_LISTBOX_SELECTION, true, this );
04727                 }
04728             }
04729             break;
04730 
04731         case WM_MOUSEWHEEL:
04732         {
04733             UINT uLines;
04734             SystemParametersInfo( SPI_GETWHEELSCROLLLINES, 0, &uLines, 0 );
04735             int nScrollAmount = int((short)HIWORD(wParam)) / WHEEL_DELTA * uLines;
04736             m_ScrollBar.Scroll( -nScrollAmount );
04737             return true;
04738         }
04739     }
04740 
04741     return false;
04742 }
04743 
04744 
04745 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04746 void CDXUTListBox::Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime )
04747 {
04748     if( m_bVisible == false )
04749         return;
04750 
04751     CDXUTElement* pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 0 );
04752     pElement->TextureColor.Blend( DXUT_STATE_NORMAL, fElapsedTime );
04753     pElement->FontColor.Blend( DXUT_STATE_NORMAL, fElapsedTime );
04754 
04755     CDXUTElement* pSelElement = m_Elements.GetAt( 1 );
04756     pSelElement->TextureColor.Blend( DXUT_STATE_NORMAL, fElapsedTime );
04757     pSelElement->FontColor.Blend( DXUT_STATE_NORMAL, fElapsedTime );
04758 
04759     m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcBoundingBox );
04760 
04761     // Render the text
04762     if( m_Items.GetSize() > 0 )
04763     {
04764         // Find out the height of a single line of text
04765         RECT rc = m_rcText;
04766         RECT rcSel = m_rcSelection;
04767         rc.bottom = rc.top + m_pDialog->GetManager()->GetFontNode( pElement->iFont )->nHeight;
04768 
04769         // Update the line height formation
04770         m_nTextHeight = rc.bottom - rc.top;
04771 
04772         static bool bSBInit;
04773         if( !bSBInit )
04774         {
04775             // Update the page size of the scroll bar
04776             if( m_nTextHeight )
04777                 m_ScrollBar.SetPageSize( RectHeight( m_rcText ) / m_nTextHeight );
04778             else
04779                 m_ScrollBar.SetPageSize( RectHeight( m_rcText ) );
04780             bSBInit = true;
04781         }
04782 
04783         rc.right = m_rcText.right;
04784         for( int i = m_ScrollBar.GetTrackPos(); i < (int)m_Items.GetSize(); ++i )
04785         {
04786             if( rc.bottom > m_rcText.bottom )
04787                 break;
04788 
04789             DXUTListBoxItem *pItem = m_Items.GetAt( i );
04790 
04791             // Determine if we need to render this item with the
04792             // selected element.
04793             bool bSelectedStyle = false;
04794 
04795             if( !( m_dwStyle & MULTISELECTION ) && i == m_nSelected )
04796                 bSelectedStyle = true;
04797             else
04798             if( m_dwStyle & MULTISELECTION )
04799             {
04800                 if( m_bDrag &&
04801                     ( ( i >= m_nSelected && i < m_nSelStart ) ||
04802                       ( i <= m_nSelected && i > m_nSelStart ) ) )
04803                     bSelectedStyle = m_Items[m_nSelStart]->bSelected;
04804                 else
04805                 if( pItem->bSelected )
04806                     bSelectedStyle = true;
04807             }
04808 
04809             if( bSelectedStyle )
04810             {
04811                 rcSel.top = rc.top; rcSel.bottom = rc.bottom;
04812                 m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pSelElement, &rcSel );
04813                 m_pDialog->DrawText( pItem->strText, pSelElement, &rc );
04814             }
04815             else
04816                 m_pDialog->DrawText( pItem->strText, pElement, &rc );
04817 
04818             OffsetRect( &rc, 0, m_nTextHeight );
04819         }
04820     }
04821 
04822     // Render the scroll bar
04823 
04824     m_ScrollBar.Render( pd3dDevice, fElapsedTime );
04825 }

04831 HRESULT (WINAPI *CUniBuffer::_ScriptStringAnalyse)( HDC, const void *, int, int, int, DWORD, int, SCRIPT_CONTROL*, SCRIPT_STATE*, const int*, SCRIPT_TABDEF*, const BYTE*, SCRIPT_STRING_ANALYSIS* ) = Dummy_ScriptStringAnalyse;

04841 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04842 // CDXUTEditBox class
04843 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04844 
04845 // When scrolling, EDITBOX_SCROLLEXTENT is reciprocal of the amount to scroll.
04846 // If EDITBOX_SCROLLEXTENT = 4, then we scroll 1/4 of the control each time.
04847 #define EDITBOX_SCROLLEXTENT 4
04848 
04849 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04850 CDXUTEditBox::CDXUTEditBox( CDXUTDialog *pDialog )
04851 {
04852     m_Type = DXUT_CONTROL_EDITBOX;
04853     m_pDialog = pDialog;
04854 
04855     m_nBorder = 5;  // Default border width
04856     m_nSpacing = 4;  // Default spacing
04857 
04858     m_bCaretOn = true;
04859     m_dfBlink = GetCaretBlinkTime() * 0.001f;
04860     m_dfLastBlink = DXUTGetGlobalTimer()->GetAbsoluteTime();
04861     s_bHideCaret = false;
04862     m_nFirstVisible = 0;
04863     m_TextColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB( 255, 16, 16, 16 );
04864     m_SelTextColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB( 255, 255, 255, 255 );
04865     m_SelBkColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB( 255, 40, 50, 92 );
04866     m_CaretColor = D3DCOLOR_ARGB( 255, 0, 0, 0 );
04867     m_nCaret = m_nSelStart = 0;
04868     m_bInsertMode = true;
04869 
04870     m_bMouseDrag = false;
04871 }
04872

04879 
04880 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04881 // PlaceCaret: Set the caret to a character position, and adjust the scrolling if
04882 //             necessary.
04883 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04884 void CDXUTEditBox::PlaceCaret( int nCP )
04885 {
04886     assert( nCP >= 0 && nCP <= m_Buffer.GetTextSize() );
04887     m_nCaret = nCP;
04888 
04889     // Obtain the X offset of the character.
04890     int nX1st, nX, nX2;
04891     m_Buffer.CPtoX( m_nFirstVisible, FALSE, &nX1st );  // 1st visible char
04892     m_Buffer.CPtoX( nCP, FALSE, &nX );  // LEAD
04893     // If nCP is the NULL terminator, get the leading edge instead of trailing.
04894     if( nCP == m_Buffer.GetTextSize() )
04895         nX2 = nX;
04896     else
04897         m_Buffer.CPtoX( nCP, TRUE, &nX2 );  // TRAIL
04898 
04899     // If the left edge of the char is smaller than the left edge of the 1st visible char,
04900     // we need to scroll left until this char is visible.
04901     if( nX < nX1st )
04902     {
04903         // Simply make the first visible character the char at the new caret position.
04904         m_nFirstVisible = nCP;
04905     }
04906     else
04907     // If the right of the character is bigger than the offset of the control's
04908     // right edge, we need to scroll right to this character.
04909     if( nX2 > nX1st + RectWidth( m_rcText ) )
04910     {
04911         // Compute the X of the new left-most pixel
04912         int nXNewLeft = nX2 - RectWidth( m_rcText );
04913 
04914         // Compute the char position of this character
04915         int nCPNew1st, nNewTrail;
04916         m_Buffer.XtoCP( nXNewLeft, &nCPNew1st, &nNewTrail );
04917 
04918         // If this coordinate is not on a character border,
04919         // start from the next character so that the caret
04920         // position does not fall outside the text rectangle.
04921         int nXNew1st;
04922         m_Buffer.CPtoX( nCPNew1st, FALSE, &nXNew1st );
04923         if( nXNew1st < nXNewLeft )
04924             ++nCPNew1st;
04925 
04926         m_nFirstVisible = nCPNew1st;
04927     }
04928 }
04929

04931 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04932 void CDXUTEditBox::ClearText()
04933 {
04934     m_Buffer.Clear();
04935     m_nFirstVisible = 0;
04936     PlaceCaret( 0 );
04937     m_nSelStart = 0;
04938 }

04941 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04942 void CDXUTEditBox::SetText( LPCWSTR wszText, bool bSelected )
04943 {
04944     assert( wszText != NULL );
04945 
04946     m_Buffer.SetText( wszText );
04947     m_nFirstVisible = 0;
04948     // Move the caret to the end of the text
04949     PlaceCaret( m_Buffer.GetTextSize() );
04950     m_nSelStart = bSelected ? 0 : m_nCaret;
04951 }

04954 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04955 HRESULT CDXUTEditBox::GetTextCopy( LPWSTR strDest, UINT bufferCount )
04956 {
04957     assert( strDest );
04958 
04959     StringCchCopy( strDest, bufferCount, m_Buffer.GetBuffer() );
04960 
04961     return S_OK;
04962 }
