04965 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04966 void CDXUTEditBox::DeleteSelectionText()
04967 {
04968     int nFirst = __min( m_nCaret, m_nSelStart );
04969     int nLast = __max( m_nCaret, m_nSelStart );
04970     // Update caret and selection
04971     PlaceCaret( nFirst );
04972     m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
04973     // Remove the characters
04974     for( int i = nFirst; i < nLast; ++i )
04975         m_Buffer.RemoveChar( nFirst );
04976 }
04977 
04978 
04979 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
04980 void CDXUTEditBox::UpdateRects()
04981 {
04982     CDXUTControl::UpdateRects();
04983 
04984     // Update the text rectangle
04985     m_rcText = m_rcBoundingBox;
04986     // First inflate by m_nBorder to compute render rects
04987     InflateRect( &m_rcText, -m_nBorder, -m_nBorder );
04988 
04989     // Update the render rectangles
04990     m_rcRender[0] = m_rcText;
04991     SetRect( &m_rcRender[1], m_rcBoundingBox.left, m_rcBoundingBox.top, m_rcText.left, m_rcText.top );
04992     SetRect( &m_rcRender[2], m_rcText.left, m_rcBoundingBox.top, m_rcText.right, m_rcText.top );
04993     SetRect( &m_rcRender[3], m_rcText.right, m_rcBoundingBox.top, m_rcBoundingBox.right, m_rcText.top );
04994     SetRect( &m_rcRender[4], m_rcBoundingBox.left, m_rcText.top, m_rcText.left, m_rcText.bottom );
04995     SetRect( &m_rcRender[5], m_rcText.right, m_rcText.top, m_rcBoundingBox.right, m_rcText.bottom );
04996     SetRect( &m_rcRender[6], m_rcBoundingBox.left, m_rcText.bottom, m_rcText.left, m_rcBoundingBox.bottom );
04997     SetRect( &m_rcRender[7], m_rcText.left, m_rcText.bottom, m_rcText.right, m_rcBoundingBox.bottom );
04998     SetRect( &m_rcRender[8], m_rcText.right, m_rcText.bottom, m_rcBoundingBox.right, m_rcBoundingBox.bottom );
04999 
05000     // Inflate further by m_nSpacing
05001     InflateRect( &m_rcText, -m_nSpacing, -m_nSpacing );
05002 }
05003 
05004 
05005 void CDXUTEditBox::CopyToClipboard()
05006 {
05007     // Copy the selection text to the clipboard
05008     if( m_nCaret != m_nSelStart && OpenClipboard( NULL ) )
05009     {
05010         EmptyClipboard();
05011 
05012         HGLOBAL hBlock = GlobalAlloc( GMEM_MOVEABLE, sizeof(WCHAR) * ( m_Buffer.GetTextSize() + 1 ) );
05013         if( hBlock )
05014         {
05015             WCHAR *pwszText = (WCHAR*)GlobalLock( hBlock );
05016             if( pwszText )
05017             {
05018                 int nFirst = __min( m_nCaret, m_nSelStart );
05019                 int nLast = __max( m_nCaret, m_nSelStart );
05020                 if( nLast - nFirst > 0 )
05021                     CopyMemory( pwszText, m_Buffer.GetBuffer() + nFirst, (nLast - nFirst) * sizeof(WCHAR) );
05022                 pwszText[nLast - nFirst] = L'\0';  // Terminate it
05023                 GlobalUnlock( hBlock );
05024             }
05025             SetClipboardData( CF_UNICODETEXT, hBlock );
05026         }
05027         CloseClipboard();
05028         // We must not free the object until CloseClipboard is called.
05029         if( hBlock )
05030             GlobalFree( hBlock );
05031     }
05032 }
05033 
05034 
05035 void CDXUTEditBox::PasteFromClipboard()
05036 {
05037     DeleteSelectionText();
05038 
05039     if( OpenClipboard( NULL ) )
05040     {
05041         HANDLE handle = GetClipboardData( CF_UNICODETEXT );
05042         if( handle )
05043         {
05044             // Convert the ANSI string to Unicode, then
05045             // insert to our buffer.
05046             WCHAR *pwszText = (WCHAR*)GlobalLock( handle );
05047             if( pwszText )
05048             {
05049                 // Copy all characters up to null.
05050                 if( m_Buffer.InsertString( m_nCaret, pwszText ) )
05051                     PlaceCaret( m_nCaret + lstrlenW( pwszText ) );
05052                 m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05053                 GlobalUnlock( handle );
05054             }
05055         }
05056         CloseClipboard();
05057     }
05058 }
05059 
05060 
05061 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05062 bool CDXUTEditBox::HandleKeyboard( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
05063 {
05064     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
05065         return false;
05066 
05067     bool bHandled = false;
05068 
05069     switch( uMsg )
05070     {
05071         case WM_KEYDOWN:
05072         {
05073             switch( wParam )
05074             {
05075                 case VK_TAB:
05076                     // We don't process Tab in case keyboard input is enabled and the user
05077                     // wishes to Tab to other controls.
05078                     break;
05079 
05080                 case VK_HOME:
05081                     PlaceCaret( 0 );
05082                     if( GetKeyState( VK_SHIFT ) >= 0 )
05083                         // Shift is not down. Update selection
05084                         // start along with the caret.
05085                         m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05086                     ResetCaretBlink();
05087                     bHandled = true;
05088                     break;
05089 
05090                 case VK_END:
05091                     PlaceCaret( m_Buffer.GetTextSize() );
05092                     if( GetKeyState( VK_SHIFT ) >= 0 )
05093                         // Shift is not down. Update selection
05094                         // start along with the caret.
05095                         m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05096                     ResetCaretBlink();
05097                     bHandled = true;
05098                     break;
05099 
05100                 case VK_INSERT:
05101                     if( GetKeyState( VK_CONTROL ) < 0 )
05102                     {
05103                         // Control Insert. Copy to clipboard
05104                         CopyToClipboard();
05105                     } else
05106                     if( GetKeyState( VK_SHIFT ) < 0 )
05107                     {
05108                         // Shift Insert. Paste from clipboard
05109                         PasteFromClipboard();
05110                     } else
05111                     {
05112                         // Toggle caret insert mode
05113                         m_bInsertMode = !m_bInsertMode;
05114                     }
05115                     break;
05116 
05117                 case VK_DELETE:
05118                     // Check if there is a text selection.
05119                     if( m_nCaret != m_nSelStart )
05120                     {
05121                         DeleteSelectionText();
05122                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE, true, this );
05123                     }
05124                     else
05125                     {
05126                         // Deleting one character
05127                         if( m_Buffer.RemoveChar( m_nCaret ) )
05128                             m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE, true, this );
05129                     }
05130                     ResetCaretBlink();
05131                     bHandled = true;
05132                     break;
05133 
05134                 case VK_LEFT:
05135                     if( GetKeyState( VK_CONTROL ) < 0 )
05136                     {
05137                         // Control is down. Move the caret to a new item
05138                         // instead of a character.
05139                         m_Buffer.GetPriorItemPos( m_nCaret, &m_nCaret );
05140                         PlaceCaret( m_nCaret );
05141                     }
05142                     else
05143                     if( m_nCaret > 0 )
05144                         PlaceCaret( m_nCaret - 1 );
05145                     if( GetKeyState( VK_SHIFT ) >= 0 )
05146                         // Shift is not down. Update selection
05147                         // start along with the caret.
05148                         m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05149                     ResetCaretBlink();
05150                     bHandled = true;
05151                     break;
05152 
05153                 case VK_RIGHT:
05154                     if( GetKeyState( VK_CONTROL ) < 0 )
05155                     {
05156                         // Control is down. Move the caret to a new item
05157                         // instead of a character.
05158                         m_Buffer.GetNextItemPos( m_nCaret, &m_nCaret );
05159                         PlaceCaret( m_nCaret );
05160                     }
05161                     else
05162                     if( m_nCaret < m_Buffer.GetTextSize() )
05163                         PlaceCaret( m_nCaret + 1 );
05164                     if( GetKeyState( VK_SHIFT ) >= 0 )
05165                         // Shift is not down. Update selection
05166                         // start along with the caret.
05167                         m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05168                     ResetCaretBlink();
05169                     bHandled = true;
05170                     break;
05171 
05172                 case VK_UP:
05173                 case VK_DOWN:
05174                     // Trap up and down arrows so that the dialog
05175                     // does not switch focus to another control.
05176                     bHandled = true;
05177                     break;
05178 
05179                 default:
05180                     bHandled = wParam != VK_ESCAPE;  // Let the application handle Esc.
05181             }
05182         }
05183     }
05184     return bHandled;
05185 }
05186 
05187 
05188 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05189 bool CDXUTEditBox::HandleMouse( UINT uMsg, POINT pt, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
05190 {
05191     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
05192         return false;
05193 
05194     switch( uMsg )
05195     {
05196         case WM_LBUTTONDOWN:
05197         case WM_LBUTTONDBLCLK:
05198         {
05199             if( !m_bHasFocus )
05200                 m_pDialog->RequestFocus( this );
05201 
05202             if( !ContainsPoint( pt ) )
05203                 return false;
05204 
05205             m_bMouseDrag = true;
05206             SetCapture( DXUTGetHWND() );
05207             // Determine the character corresponding to the coordinates.
05208             int nCP, nTrail, nX1st;
05209             m_Buffer.CPtoX( m_nFirstVisible, FALSE, &nX1st );  // X offset of the 1st visible char
05210             if( SUCCEEDED( m_Buffer.XtoCP( pt.x - m_rcText.left + nX1st, &nCP, &nTrail ) ) )
05211             {
05212                 // Cap at the NULL character.
05213                 if( nTrail && nCP < m_Buffer.GetTextSize() )
05214                     PlaceCaret( nCP + 1 );
05215                 else
05216                     PlaceCaret( nCP );
05217                 m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05218                 ResetCaretBlink();
05219             }
05220             return true;
05221         }
05222 
05223         case WM_LBUTTONUP:
05224             ReleaseCapture();
05225             m_bMouseDrag = false;
05226             break;
05227 
05228         case WM_MOUSEMOVE:
05229             if( m_bMouseDrag )
05230             {
05231                 // Determine the character corresponding to the coordinates.
05232                 int nCP, nTrail, nX1st;
05233                 m_Buffer.CPtoX( m_nFirstVisible, FALSE, &nX1st );  // X offset of the 1st visible char
05234                 if( SUCCEEDED( m_Buffer.XtoCP( pt.x - m_rcText.left + nX1st, &nCP, &nTrail ) ) )
05235                 {
05236                     // Cap at the NULL character.
05237                     if( nTrail && nCP < m_Buffer.GetTextSize() )
05238                         PlaceCaret( nCP + 1 );
05239                     else
05240                         PlaceCaret( nCP );
05241                 }
05242             }
05243             break;
05244     }
05245 
05246     return false;
05247 }
05248 
05249 
05250 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05251 void CDXUTEditBox::OnFocusIn()
05252 {
05253     CDXUTControl::OnFocusIn();
05254 
05255     ResetCaretBlink();
05256 }
05257 
05258 
05259 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05260 bool CDXUTEditBox::MsgProc( UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam )
05261 {
05262     if( !m_bEnabled || !m_bVisible )
05263         return false;
05264 
05265     switch( uMsg )
05266     {
05267         case WM_CHAR:
05268         {
05269             switch( (WCHAR)wParam )
05270             {
05271                 // Backspace
05272                 case VK_BACK:
05273                 {
05274                     // If there's a selection, treat this
05275                     // like a delete key.
05276                     if( m_nCaret != m_nSelStart )
05277                     {
05278                         DeleteSelectionText();
05279                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE, true, this );
05280                     }
05281                     else
05282                     if( m_nCaret > 0 )
05283                     {
05284                         // Move the caret, then delete the char.
05285                         PlaceCaret( m_nCaret - 1 );
05286                         m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05287                         m_Buffer.RemoveChar( m_nCaret );
05288                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE, true, this );
05289                     }
05290                     ResetCaretBlink();
05291                     break;
05292                 }
05293 
05294                 case 24:        // Ctrl-X Cut
05295                 case VK_CANCEL: // Ctrl-C Copy
05296                 {
05297                     CopyToClipboard();
05298 
05299                     // If the key is Ctrl-X, delete the selection too.
05300                     if( (WCHAR)wParam == 24 )
05301                     {
05302                         DeleteSelectionText();
05303                         m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE, true, this );
05304                     }
05305 
05306                     break;
05307                 }
05308 
05309                 // Ctrl-V Paste
05310                 case 22:
05311                 {
05312                     PasteFromClipboard();
05313                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE, true, this );
05314                     break;
05315                 }
05316 
05317                 // Ctrl-A Select All
05318                 case 1:
05319                     if( m_nSelStart == m_nCaret )
05320                     {
05321                         m_nSelStart = 0;
05322                         PlaceCaret( m_Buffer.GetTextSize() );
05323                     }
05324                     break;
05325 
05326                 case VK_RETURN:
05327                     // Invoke the callback when the user presses Enter.
05328                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_STRING, true, this );
05329                     break;
05330 
05331                 // Junk characters we don't want in the string
05332                 case 26:  // Ctrl Z
05333                 case 2:   // Ctrl B
05334                 case 14:  // Ctrl N
05335                 case 19:  // Ctrl S
05336                 case 4:   // Ctrl D
05337                 case 6:   // Ctrl F
05338                 case 7:   // Ctrl G
05339                 case 10:  // Ctrl J
05340                 case 11:  // Ctrl K
05341                 case 12:  // Ctrl L
05342                 case 17:  // Ctrl Q
05343                 case 23:  // Ctrl W
05344                 case 5:   // Ctrl E
05345                 case 18:  // Ctrl R
05346                 case 20:  // Ctrl T
05347                 case 25:  // Ctrl Y
05348                 case 21:  // Ctrl U
05349                 case 9:   // Ctrl I
05350                 case 15:  // Ctrl O
05351                 case 16:  // Ctrl P
05352                 case 27:  // Ctrl [
05353                 case 29:  // Ctrl ]
05354                 case 28:  // Ctrl \ 
05355                     break;
05356 
05357                 default:
05358                 {
05359                     // If there's a selection and the user
05360                     // starts to type, the selection should
05361                     // be deleted.
05362                     if( m_nCaret != m_nSelStart )
05363                         DeleteSelectionText();
05364 
05365                     // If we are in overwrite mode and there is already
05366                     // a char at the caret's position, simply replace it.
05367                     // Otherwise, we insert the char as normal.
05368                     if( !m_bInsertMode && m_nCaret < m_Buffer.GetTextSize() )
05369                     {
05370                         m_Buffer[m_nCaret] = (WCHAR)wParam;
05371                         PlaceCaret( m_nCaret + 1 );
05372                         m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05373                     } else
05374                     {
05375                         // Insert the char
05376                         if( m_Buffer.InsertChar( m_nCaret, (WCHAR)wParam ) )
05377                         {
05378                             PlaceCaret( m_nCaret + 1 );
05379                             m_nSelStart = m_nCaret;
05380                         }
05381                     }
05382                     ResetCaretBlink();
05383                     m_pDialog->SendEvent( EVENT_EDITBOX_CHANGE, true, this );
05384                 }
05385             }
05386             return true;
05387         }
05388     }
05389     return false;
05390 }
05391 
05392 
05393 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05394 void CDXUTEditBox::Render( IDirect3DDevice9* pd3dDevice, float fElapsedTime )
05395 {
05396     if( m_bVisible == false )
05397         return;
05398 
05399     HRESULT hr;
05400     int nSelStartX = 0, nCaretX = 0;  // Left and right X cordinates of the selection region
05401 
05402     CDXUTElement* pElement = GetElement( 0 );
05403     if( pElement )
05404     {
05405         m_Buffer.SetFontNode( m_pDialog->GetFont( pElement->iFont ) );
05406         PlaceCaret( m_nCaret );  // Call PlaceCaret now that we have the font info (node),
05407                                  // so that scrolling can be handled.
05408     }
05409 
05410     // Render the control graphics
05411     for( int e = 0; e < 9; ++e )
05412     {
05413         pElement = m_Elements.GetAt( e );
05414         pElement->TextureColor.Blend( DXUT_STATE_NORMAL, fElapsedTime );
05415 
05416         m_pDialog->DrawSprite( pElement, &m_rcRender[e] );
05417     }
05418 
05419     //
05420     // Compute the X coordinates of the first visible character.
05421     //
05422     int nXFirst;
05423     m_Buffer.CPtoX( m_nFirstVisible, FALSE, &nXFirst );
05424 
05425     //
05426     // Compute the X coordinates of the selection rectangle
05427     //
05428     hr = m_Buffer.CPtoX( m_nCaret, FALSE, &nCaretX );
05429     if( m_nCaret != m_nSelStart )
05430         hr = m_Buffer.CPtoX( m_nSelStart, FALSE, &nSelStartX );
05431     else
05432         nSelStartX = nCaretX;
05433 
05434     //
05435     // Render the selection rectangle
05436     //
05437     RECT rcSelection;  // Make this available for rendering selected text
05438     if( m_nCaret != m_nSelStart )
05439     {
05440         int nSelLeftX = nCaretX, nSelRightX = nSelStartX;
05441         // Swap if left is bigger than right
05442         if( nSelLeftX > nSelRightX )
05443             { int nTemp = nSelLeftX; nSelLeftX = nSelRightX; nSelRightX = nTemp; }
05444 
05445         SetRect( &rcSelection, nSelLeftX, m_rcText.top, nSelRightX, m_rcText.bottom );
05446         OffsetRect( &rcSelection, m_rcText.left - nXFirst, 0 );
05447         IntersectRect( &rcSelection, &m_rcText, &rcSelection );
05448         m_pDialog->DrawRect( &rcSelection, m_SelBkColor );
05449     }
05450 
05451     //
05452     // Render the text
05453     //
05454     // Element 0 for text
05455     m_Elements.GetAt( 0 )->FontColor.Current = m_TextColor;
05456     m_pDialog->DrawText( m_Buffer.GetBuffer() + m_nFirstVisible, m_Elements.GetAt( 0 ), &m_rcText );
05457 
05458     // Render the selected text
05459     if( m_nCaret != m_nSelStart )
05460     {
05461         int nFirstToRender = __max( m_nFirstVisible, __min( m_nSelStart, m_nCaret ) );
05462         int nNumChatToRender = __max( m_nSelStart, m_nCaret ) - nFirstToRender;
05463         m_Elements.GetAt( 0 )->FontColor.Current = m_SelTextColor;
05464         m_pDialog->DrawText( m_Buffer.GetBuffer() + nFirstToRender,
05465                              m_Elements.GetAt( 0 ), &rcSelection, false, nNumChatToRender );
05466     }
05467 
05468     //
05469     // Blink the caret
05470     //
05471     if( DXUTGetGlobalTimer()->GetAbsoluteTime() - m_dfLastBlink >= m_dfBlink )
05472     {
05473         m_bCaretOn = !m_bCaretOn;
05474         m_dfLastBlink = DXUTGetGlobalTimer()->GetAbsoluteTime();
05475     }
05476 
05477     //
05478     // Render the caret if this control has the focus
05479     //
05480     if( m_bHasFocus && m_bCaretOn && !s_bHideCaret )
05481     {
05482         // Start the rectangle with insert mode caret
05483         RECT rcCaret = { m_rcText.left - nXFirst + nCaretX - 1, m_rcText.top,
05484                          m_rcText.left - nXFirst + nCaretX + 1, m_rcText.bottom };
05485 
05486         // If we are in overwrite mode, adjust the caret rectangle
05487         // to fill the entire character.
05488         if( !m_bInsertMode )
05489         {
05490             // Obtain the right edge X coord of the current character
05491             int nRightEdgeX;
05492             m_Buffer.CPtoX( m_nCaret, TRUE, &nRightEdgeX );
05493             rcCaret.right = m_rcText.left - nXFirst + nRightEdgeX;
05494         }
05495 
05496         m_pDialog->DrawRect( &rcCaret, m_CaretColor );
05497     }
05498 }
05499 
05500 
05501 #define IN_FLOAT_CHARSET( c ) \
05502     ( (c) == L'-' || (c) == L'.' || ( (c) >= L'0' && (c) <= L'9' ) )
05503 
05504 void CDXUTEditBox::ParseFloatArray( float *pNumbers, int nCount )
05505 {
05506     int nWritten = 0;  // Number of floats written
05507     const WCHAR *pToken, *pEnd;
05508     WCHAR wszToken[60];
05509 
05510     pToken = m_Buffer.GetBuffer();
05511     while( nWritten < nCount && *pToken != L'\0' )
05512     {
05513         // Skip leading spaces
05514         while( *pToken == L' ' )
05515             ++pToken;
05516 
05517         if( *pToken == L'\0' )
05518             break;
05519 
05520         // Locate the end of number
05521         pEnd = pToken;
05522         while( IN_FLOAT_CHARSET( *pEnd ) )
05523             ++pEnd;
05524 
05525         // Copy the token to our buffer
05526         int nTokenLen = __min( sizeof(wszToken) / sizeof(wszToken[0]) - 1, int(pEnd - pToken) );
05527         StringCchCopy( wszToken, nTokenLen, pToken );
05528         *pNumbers = (float)wcstod( wszToken, NULL );
05529         ++nWritten;
05530         ++pNumbers;
05531         pToken = pEnd;
05532     }
05533 }
05534 
05535 
05536 void CDXUTEditBox::SetTextFloatArray( const float *pNumbers, int nCount )
05537 {
05538     WCHAR wszBuffer[512] = {0};
05539     WCHAR wszTmp[64];
05540     
05541     if( pNumbers == NULL )
05542         return;
05543         
05544     for( int i = 0; i < nCount; ++i )
05545     {
05546         StringCchPrintf( wszTmp, 64, L"%.4f ", pNumbers[i] );
05547         StringCchCat( wszBuffer, 512, wszTmp );
05548     }
05549 
05550     // Don't want the last space
05551     if( nCount > 0 && wcslen(wszBuffer) > 0 )
05552         wszBuffer[wcslen(wszBuffer)-1] = 0;
05553 
05554     SetText( wszBuffer );
05555 }

05706 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05707 void CDXUTIMEEditBox::UpdateRects()
05708 {
05709     // Temporary adjust m_width so that CDXUTEditBox can compute
05710     // the correct rects for its rendering since we need to make space
05711     // for the indicator button
05712     int nWidth = m_width;
05713     m_width -= m_nIndicatorWidth + m_nBorder * 2; // Make room for the indicator button
05714     CDXUTEditBox::UpdateRects();
05715     m_width = nWidth;  // Restore
05716 
05717     // Compute the indicator button rectangle
05718     SetRect( &m_rcIndicator, m_rcBoundingBox.right, m_rcBoundingBox.top, m_x + m_width, m_rcBoundingBox.bottom );
05719 //    InflateRect( &m_rcIndicator, -m_nBorder, -m_nBorder );
05720     m_rcBoundingBox.right = m_rcBoundingBox.left + m_width;
05721 }

05723 
05724 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05725 //  GetImeId( UINT uIndex )
05726 //      returns 
05727 //  returned value:
05728 //  0: In the following cases
05729 //      - Non Chinese IME input locale
05730 //      - Older Chinese IME
05731 //      - Other error cases
05732 //
05733 //  Othewise:
05734 //      When uIndex is 0 (default)
05735 //          bit 31-24:  Major version
05736 //          bit 23-16:  Minor version
05737 //          bit 15-0:   Language ID
05738 //      When uIndex is 1
05739 //          pVerFixedInfo->dwFileVersionLS
05740 //
05741 //  Use IMEID_VER and IMEID_LANG macro to extract version and language information.
05742 //  
05743 
05744 // We define the locale-invariant ID ourselves since it doesn't exist prior to WinXP
05745 // For more information, see the CompareString() reference.
05746 #define LCID_INVARIANT MAKELCID(MAKELANGID(LANG_ENGLISH, SUBLANG_ENGLISH_US), SORT_DEFAULT)
05747 
05748 DWORD CDXUTIMEEditBox::GetImeId( UINT uIndex )
05749 {
05750     static HKL hklPrev = 0;
05751     static DWORD dwID[2] = { 0, 0 };  // Cache the result
05752     
05753     DWORD   dwVerSize;
05754     DWORD   dwVerHandle;
05755     LPVOID  lpVerBuffer;
05756     LPVOID  lpVerData;
05757     UINT    cbVerData;
05758     char    szTmp[1024];
05759 
05760     if( uIndex >= sizeof( dwID ) / sizeof( dwID[0] ) )
05761         return 0;
05762 
05763     if( hklPrev == s_hklCurrent )
05764         return dwID[uIndex];
05765 
05766     hklPrev = s_hklCurrent;  // Save for the next invocation
05767 
05768     // Check if we are using an older Chinese IME
05769     if( !( ( s_hklCurrent == _CHT_HKL ) || ( s_hklCurrent == _CHT_HKL2 ) || ( s_hklCurrent == _CHS_HKL ) ) )
05770     {
05771         dwID[0] = dwID[1] = 0;
05772         return dwID[uIndex];
05773     }
05774 
05775     // Obtain the IME file name
05776     if ( !_ImmGetIMEFileNameA( s_hklCurrent, szTmp, ( sizeof(szTmp) / sizeof(szTmp[0]) ) - 1 ) )
05777     {
05778         dwID[0] = dwID[1] = 0;
05779         return dwID[uIndex];
05780     }
05781 
05782     // Check for IME that doesn't implement reading string API
05783     if ( !_GetReadingString )
05784     {
05785         if( ( CompareStringA( LCID_INVARIANT, NORM_IGNORECASE, szTmp, -1, CHT_IMEFILENAME1, -1 ) != CSTR_EQUAL ) &&
05786             ( CompareStringA( LCID_INVARIANT, NORM_IGNORECASE, szTmp, -1, CHT_IMEFILENAME2, -1 ) != CSTR_EQUAL ) &&
05787             ( CompareStringA( LCID_INVARIANT, NORM_IGNORECASE, szTmp, -1, CHT_IMEFILENAME3, -1 ) != CSTR_EQUAL ) &&
05788             ( CompareStringA( LCID_INVARIANT, NORM_IGNORECASE, szTmp, -1, CHS_IMEFILENAME1, -1 ) != CSTR_EQUAL ) &&
05789             ( CompareStringA( LCID_INVARIANT, NORM_IGNORECASE, szTmp, -1, CHS_IMEFILENAME2, -1 ) != CSTR_EQUAL ) )
05790         {
05791             dwID[0] = dwID[1] = 0;
05792             return dwID[uIndex];
05793         }
05794     }
05795 
05796     dwVerSize = _GetFileVersionInfoSizeA( szTmp, &dwVerHandle );
05797     if( dwVerSize )
05798     {
05799         lpVerBuffer = HeapAlloc( GetProcessHeap(), 0, dwVerSize );
05800         if( lpVerBuffer )
05801         {
05802             if( _GetFileVersionInfoA( szTmp, dwVerHandle, dwVerSize, lpVerBuffer ) )
05803             {
05804                 if( _VerQueryValueA( lpVerBuffer, "\\", &lpVerData, &cbVerData ) )
05805                 {
05806                     DWORD dwVer = ( (VS_FIXEDFILEINFO*)lpVerData )->dwFileVersionMS;
05807                     dwVer = ( dwVer & 0x00ff0000 ) << 8 | ( dwVer & 0x000000ff ) << 16;
05808                     if( _GetReadingString
05809                         ||
05810                         ( GetLanguage() == LANG_CHT &&
05811                           ( dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(4, 2) || 
05812                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(4, 3) || 
05813                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(4, 4) || 
05814                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(5, 0) ||
05815                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(5, 1) ||
05816                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(5, 2) ||
05817                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(6, 0) ) )
05818                         ||
05819                         ( GetLanguage() == LANG_CHS &&
05820                           ( dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(4, 1) ||
05821                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(4, 2) ||
05822                             dwVer == MAKEIMEVERSION(5, 3) ) )
05823                       )
05824                     {
05825                         dwID[0] = dwVer | GetLanguage();
05826                         dwID[1] = ( (VS_FIXEDFILEINFO*)lpVerData )->dwFileVersionLS;
05827                     }
05828                 }
05829             }
05830             HeapFree( GetProcessHeap(), 0, lpVerBuffer );
05831         }
05832     }
05833 
05834     return dwID[uIndex];
05835 }
05836 
05837 
05838 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05839 void CDXUTIMEEditBox::CheckInputLocale()
05840 {
05841     static HKL hklPrev = 0;
05842     s_hklCurrent = GetKeyboardLayout( 0 );
05843     if ( hklPrev == s_hklCurrent )
05844         return;
05845 
05846     hklPrev = s_hklCurrent;
05847     switch ( GetPrimaryLanguage() )
05848     {
05849         // Simplified Chinese
05850         case LANG_CHINESE:
05851             s_bVerticalCand = true;
05852             switch ( GetSubLanguage() )
05853             {
05854                 case SUBLANG_CHINESE_SIMPLIFIED:
05855                     s_wszCurrIndicator = s_aszIndicator[INDICATOR_CHS];
05856                     s_bVerticalCand = GetImeId() == 0;
05857                     break;
05858                 case SUBLANG_CHINESE_TRADITIONAL:
05859                     s_wszCurrIndicator = s_aszIndicator[INDICATOR_CHT];
05860                     break;
05861                 default:    // unsupported sub-language
05862                     s_wszCurrIndicator = s_aszIndicator[INDICATOR_NON_IME];
05863                     break;
05864             }
05865             break;
05866         // Korean
05867         case LANG_KOREAN:
05868             s_wszCurrIndicator = s_aszIndicator[INDICATOR_KOREAN];
05869             s_bVerticalCand = false;
05870             break;
05871         // Japanese
05872         case LANG_JAPANESE:
05873             s_wszCurrIndicator = s_aszIndicator[INDICATOR_JAPANESE];
05874             s_bVerticalCand = true;
05875             break;
05876         default:
05877             // A non-IME language.  Obtain the language abbreviation
05878             // and store it for rendering the indicator later.
05879             s_wszCurrIndicator = s_aszIndicator[INDICATOR_NON_IME];
05880     }
05881 
05882     // If non-IME, use the language abbreviation.
05883     if( s_wszCurrIndicator == s_aszIndicator[INDICATOR_NON_IME] )
05884     {
05885         WCHAR wszLang[5];
05886         GetLocaleInfoW( MAKELCID( LOWORD( s_hklCurrent ), SORT_DEFAULT ), LOCALE_SABBREVLANGNAME, wszLang, 5 );
05887         s_wszCurrIndicator[0] = wszLang[0];
05888         s_wszCurrIndicator[1] = towlower( wszLang[1] );
05889     }
05890 }
05891 
05892 
05893 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05894 void CDXUTIMEEditBox::CheckToggleState()
05895 {
05896     CheckInputLocale();
05897     bool bIme = _ImmIsIME( s_hklCurrent ) != 0;
05898     s_bChineseIME = ( GetPrimaryLanguage() == LANG_CHINESE ) && bIme;
05899 
05900     HIMC hImc;
05901     if( NULL != ( hImc = _ImmGetContext( DXUTGetHWND() ) ) )
05902     {
05903         if( s_bChineseIME )
05904         {
05905             DWORD dwConvMode, dwSentMode;
05906             _ImmGetConversionStatus( hImc, &dwConvMode, &dwSentMode );
05907             s_ImeState = ( dwConvMode & IME_CMODE_NATIVE ) ? IMEUI_STATE_ON : IMEUI_STATE_ENGLISH;
05908         }
05909         else
05910         {
05911             s_ImeState = ( bIme && _ImmGetOpenStatus( hImc ) != 0 ) ? IMEUI_STATE_ON : IMEUI_STATE_OFF;
05912         }
05913         _ImmReleaseContext( DXUTGetHWND(), hImc );
05914     }
05915     else
05916         s_ImeState = IMEUI_STATE_OFF;
05917 }

05920 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05921 // Enable/disable the entire IME system.  When disabled, the default IME handling
05922 // kicks in.
05923 void CDXUTIMEEditBox::EnableImeSystem( bool bEnable )
05924 {
05925     s_bEnableImeSystem = bEnable;
05926 }

05929 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
05930 // Sets up IME-specific APIs for the IME edit controls.  This is called every time
05931 // the input locale changes.
05932 void CDXUTIMEEditBox::SetupImeApi()
05933 {
05934     char szImeFile[MAX_PATH + 1];
05935 
05936     _GetReadingString = NULL;
05937     _ShowReadingWindow = NULL;
05938     if( _ImmGetIMEFileNameA( s_hklCurrent, szImeFile, sizeof(szImeFile)/sizeof(szImeFile[0]) - 1 ) == 0 )
05939         return;
05940 
05941     if( s_hDllIme ) FreeLibrary( s_hDllIme );
05942     s_hDllIme = LoadLibraryA( szImeFile );
05943     if ( !s_hDllIme )
05944         return;
05945     _GetReadingString = (UINT (WINAPI*)(HIMC, UINT, LPWSTR, PINT, BOOL*, PUINT))
05946         ( GetProcAddress( s_hDllIme, "GetReadingString" ) );
05947     _ShowReadingWindow =(BOOL (WINAPI*)(HIMC, BOOL))
05948         ( GetProcAddress( s_hDllIme, "ShowReadingWindow" ) );
05949 }
